enhanced_description: Lexly Health offers an AI-powered physiotherapy program designed to treat chronic back pain, creating personalized 5-minute exercise routines. The platform reduces barriers to adoption and enhances user compliance through its bite-sized programs. It features real-time AI motion tracking for immediate posture feedback, ensuring user safety and exercise effectiveness. Additionally, users receive 1-to-1 tele-consultations and continuous support from in-house Health Coaches and Physiotherapists, guiding them through their health journey.
